prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json

    ],

      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Tandoori-Style Chicken with Jeera Rice and Quick Raita",
  "description": "Oven-roasted yogurt-marinated chicken thighs with cumin-scented basmati rice and a cool cucumber-mint raita. Family-friendly with adjustable mild-to-medium heat.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F). Line a baking tray.",
    "In a bowl, mix yoghurt, lemon juice, garlic (minced), garam masala, chilli powder, and salt for the marinade.",
    "Pat dry chicken thigh fillets and cut large pieces into even sizes.",
    "Measure basmati rice and vegetable stock.",
    "Slice cucumber finely and chop mint.",
    "Set out garlic naan bread, ready to warm."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Toss chicken thigh fillets in the marinade until coated; rest 10 minutes.",
    "Place chicken on the lined tray, drizzle with canola oil, and roast 20–25 minutes, turning once, until cooked through and lightly charred at the edges.",
    "While chicken roasts, heat ghee in a pot over medium heat; add cumin seeds and bay leaves, toast 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Add basmati rice; stir to coat 1 minute. Pour in vegetable stock, add a pinch of salt, bring to a boil, then reduce to low, cover, and cook 12–15 minutes until stock is absorbed. Rest 5 minutes off heat.",
    "For raita: combine yoghurt, cucumber, mint, and a pinch of salt in a small bowl.",
    "Warm garlic naan bread on the oven rack for the last 3–4 minutes of chicken roasting.",
    "Fluff rice with a fork. Serve chicken over jeera rice with raita on the side and warm naan."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken thigh fillets",
      "quantity": "800 g",
      "preparation": "patted dry"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "yoghurt",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "for marinade"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "4 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garam masala",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chilli powder",
      "quantity": "1/2 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "1 1/4 tsp",
      "preparation": "divided"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "canola oil",
      "quantity": "1 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ghee",
      "quantity": "1 tbsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cumin seeds",
      "quantity": "1 tsp"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bay leaves",
      "quantity": "2"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "basmati rice",
      "quantity": "2 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "vegetable stock",
      "quantity": "4 cups"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "yoghurt",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "for raita"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cucumber",
      "quantity": "1/2",
      "preparation": "finely sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "mint",
      "quantity": "2 tbsp",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic naan bread",
      "quantity": "4"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Indian",
      "MiddleEastern"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "30to60"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Intermediate"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Medium",
      "Mild"
    ],

    ],

    ],

      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
